question.title: QR Code Provisioning For Admin Setup app in android Failed
question.body:
I have use either google test DPC app or my own signed build app for QR code provisioning.

I got every time same error Something went wrong please contact your admin or Couldn't Setup device

This is my JSON format for QR code generation.

**{
  "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_COMPONENT_NAME": "com.my app/.myAdminReceiver",
  "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_SIGNATURE_CHECKSUM": "7yRxgSgepvItKzc+eDZi3qaIdVlzKwyM27+mujSVU0U",
  "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_PACKAGE_DOWNLOAD_LOCATION": "https://android-application/test/app-release.apk",
  "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_LEAVE_ALL_SYSTEM_APPS_ENABLED": true,
  "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_SKIP_ENCRYPTION": false
}**

My conditions:
using this JSON format to generate QR code

provision device by 6 time tapping on new fresh android device
Downloading app
got a screen where I got a message This device belongs to Your Organization

after that got error screen (Something went wrong please contact your admin or Couldn't Setup device)

please help me

question_comments.body: Don't add code or configuration in comments. edit the question to add them.
@KamranKhalid if you have do this help me

this is my sha value in hex   Signer #1 certificate DN: CN=android Signer #1 certificate SHA-256 digest: ef247181281e9bf22b4acdf1e78365b27aa68875594cac8c3236ef2f9ae8‌​d255 Signer #1 certificate SHA-1 digest: a23f944a5b7743af006c818b5b7cc43a39d3b176 Signer #1 certificate MD5 digest: 229c4f40d2c4715f733dffaba99fee47

this is my actual payload for qr code provisisioning { "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_COMPONENT_NAME"‌​: "com.wardwizpaylock/.WardWizDeviceAdminReceiver", "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_SIGNATURE_CHECK‌​SUM": "7yRxgSgekfIrSs3x54NlsonmiHVZTKyMMjbvL5rt0lU", "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_PACKAGE_DOWNLOA‌​D_LOCATION": "buildstash.site/projects/wardwiz-paylock/android-applicatio‌​n/…", "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_LEAVE_ALL_SYSTEM_APPS_ENABLE‌​D": true, "android.app.extra.PROVISIONING_SKIP_ENCRYPTION": false }

Check that com.myapp/.myAdminReceiver exactly matches your manifest (with out spaces), make sure the PROVISIONING_DEVICE_ADMIN_SIGNATURE_CHECKSUM is the correct base64 SHA-256 of your signing cert, and confirm the APK URL is directly reachable without redirects.
